#summary The Open Ad Streamer Javascript API
#sidebar TableOfContents

----
===1. CALLBACK EVENTS===

====1.1 AD AND SHOW STREAM SCHEDULING====

{{{
onLinearAdScheduled(streamIndex, baseURL, streamName, startTime, duration)
onNonLinearAdScheduled(associatedStreamIndex, startTime, duration)
}}}

====1.2 AD RUNTIME RELATED EVENTS====
{{{
onLinearAdStart()
onLinearAdFirstQuartileComplete()
onLinearAdMidPointComplete()
onLinearAdThirdQuartileComplete()
onLinearAdFinish()
onLinearAdClick()
onNonLinearAdShow()
onNonLinearAdClickThrough()
onNonLinearAdHide()
onCompanionAdShow()
onCompanionAdHide()
onAdNoticeShow()
onAdNoticeHide()
onRegionCloseClicked()
onRegionClicked()
}}}

====1.3 SHOW STREAM RUNTIME EVENTS====

{{{
onShowStart(streamName, streamIndex)
onShowComplete(streamName, streamIndex)
onShowStopped(streamName, streamIndex)
onShowPaused(streamName, streamIndex)
onShowResumed(streamName, streamIndex)
onShowMute(streamName, streamIndex)
onShowUnmute(streamName, streamIndex)
onShowFullscreen(streamName, streamIndex)
}}}

====1.4 VAST Response====
{{{
onVASTLoadSuccess(template:String)
onVASTLoadFailure(error:String)
}}}

====2.3 Region Manipulation====
{{{
defineRegion(regionID:String, properties:Object):String

setRegionWidth(regionID:String, height:String):String
setRegionDimensions(regionID:String, height:String, width:String):String
setRegionVerticalAlign(regionID:String, verticalAlign:Boolean):String
setRegionHorizontalAlign(regionID:String, horizontalAlign:Boolean):String
setRegionBackgroundColor(regionID:String, color:String):String
setRegionOpacity(regionID:String, opacity:String):String
setRegionPadding(regionID:String, height:String):String
setRegionCloseButtonVisible(regionID:String, visible:Boolean):String
setRegionKeepAfterClick(regionID:String, keepAfterClick:Boolean):String
}}}
